meanings.definition: A loose-fitting garment worn for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: I like to wear my comfortable nightshirt to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new nightshirt with cute patterns on it.
meanings.sent3: The nightshirt danced in the wind on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were wrapped in the soft embrace of the nightshirt.
meanings.sent5: The nightshirt felt like a cozy hug from a friend.

meanings.definition: A long, loose shirt worn for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My favorite nightshirt is blue and has buttons.
meanings.sent2: He forgot to pack his nightshirt for the sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The nightshirt decided to take a nap during the day instead.
meanings.sent4: Her nightshirt was a shield against the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The nightshirt whispered secrets of peaceful slumber.
